patthana2.4:266.1_1: ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kāmarāgasaññojano diṭṭhisaññojanassa avijjāsaññojanassa
patthana2.4:267.1_0: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa ceva no ca saññojanassa
patthana2.4:267.1_1: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—saññojanā ceva saññojanasampayuttā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.4:268.1_0: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa
patthana2.4:268.1_1: ca saññojanasampayuttassa ceva no ca saññojanassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kāmarāgasaññojano
patthana2.4:268.1_2: diṭṭhisaññojanassa avijjāsaññojanassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.4:269.1_0: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa
patthana2.4:269.1_1: ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—saññojane ārabbha saññojanā uppajjanti. (Mūlaṁ
patthana2.4:269.1_2: kātabbaṁ.) Saññojane ārabbha saññojanasampayuttā ceva no ca saññojanā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.4:269.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Saññojane ārabbha saññojanā ca saññojanasampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.4:270.1_0: Saññojanasampayutto ceva no ca saññojano dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa ceva no ca
patthana2.4:270.1_1: saññojanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—saññojanasampayutte ceva no ca saññojane
patthana2.4:270.1_2: khandhe ārabbha saññojanasampayuttā ceva no ca saññojanā khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana2.4:272.1_2: paccayo—saññojanasampayutte ceva no ca saññojane khandhe ārabbha saññojanā ca saññojanasampayuttakā

patthana2.4:276.1_1: dhammā saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi.

patthana2.4:277.1_1: ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … nava (ninnānākaraṇaṁ, vibhajanā natthi.

patthana2.4:277.1_4: paccayo … nava (ārammaṇanayena kātabbā) … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.

patthana2.4:278.1_3: paccayo … nava … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … nava … atthipaccayena paccayo … nava

patthana2.4:281.1_0: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa
patthana2.4:281.1_1: ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana2.4:282.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.4:283.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi …pe… namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.4:284.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomapadāni kātabbāni) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.4:286.1_0: Saññojanavippayuttaṁ saññojaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo
patthana2.4:286.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saññojanavippayuttaṁ saññojaniyaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana2.4:286.1_2: tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
